description: Written exam covering Weeks 5-10 content with multiple choice, short answers, and problem-solving questions. Assesses understanding of polymer morphology, mechanical properties, processing, manufacturing, and sustainable life cycle management.

Written test in Week 5 covering Weeks 1-4 content. Includes multiple choice, short answers, and problem-solving questions on polymer synthesis, characterization, thermodynamics, and solution behavior.
